TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BypassLockedItemDelegateMethod extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub BypassLockedItemDelegateMethod(listItem As SPListItem)

Docs.summary: Bypasses record locks of the specified item.

remarks.para: When an item is declared as record, it may be locked down and cannot be edited. Use CommonUtilities.BypassLocks(SPListItem, BypassLockedItemDelegateMethod) when it is necessary to bypass the lock. The operation to perform while the lock is bypassed is implemented in the BypassLockedItemDelegateMethod delegate.
